required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Assessment of the Impact of Gadolinium Injection on the Measurement of the QSM Signal
clinical_study.official_title: Assessment of the Impact of Gadolinium Injection on the Measurement of the QSM Signal

brief_summary.textblock: Patients meeting the inclusion and non-inclusion criteria will be offered to participate in the study. If they agree, they will perform an MRI without injection to obtain the QSM then perform the MRI with injection that was prescribed to them as part of the care, then they will perform a second time the MRI without injection to obtain the QSM. They will also answer a short questionnaire documenting their previous exposure to gadolinium.

detailed_description.textblock: Patients meeting the inclusion and non-inclusion criteria will be offered to participate in the study. If they agree, they will perform an MRI without injection to obtain the QSM then perform the MRI with injection that was prescribed to them as part of the care, then they will perform a second time the MRI without injection to obtain the QSM. They will also answer a short questionnaire documenting their previous exposure to gadolinium.

primary_outcome.measure: mean of the delta observed between the QSM of the white matter before and after injection of gadolinium
primary_outcome.description: mean of the delta observed between the QSM of the white matter before and after injection of gadolinium

intervention.description: SWI QSM 1.0iso 8 echos sequence performed before and after the injected MRI prescribed as part of the treatment. * Sense 2 * 2: 9min33s

study_pop.textblock: Patients meeting the inclusion and non-inclusion criteria will be offered to participate in the study. If they agree, they will perform an MRI without injection to obtain the QSM then perform the MRI with injection that was prescribed to them as part of the care, then they will perform a second time the MRI without injection to obtain the QSM. They will also answer a short questionnaire documenting their previous exposure to gadolinium.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- patients over 18 years old
- with an inflammatory CNS pathology
- to benefit as part of care from an MRI with injection of gadolinium
- consent to participate in the study
- beneficiary of a social protection scheme
Exclusion Criteria:
- pregnant or breastfeeding woman
- patient benefiting from a legal protection measure
- Patient having performed more than 3 MRI exams with gadolinium injection during his life
